author: pero
msg: StandardService.getConnectorNames() return array of Connector JMX objectnames.

author: rgreig
msg: (Pacth by Rupert Smith) Fixed mistake in PingPongProducer, it was creating its message counter after
sending messages, so sometimes the onMessage loop had already received mesages before the counter was created.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Updating the build system on Mac OS X to be able to hide the configuration, features and plugins folders, as well as the startup.jar file inside the Application itself.
